levels.description: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> and attacks <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies simultaneously; Extend the effect duration of <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> enemies within Attack Range until the skill ends, then deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> enemies and remove the <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> effect when the skill ends; Prioritizes enemies that are not <$ba.frozen>Frozen</>
